item.title: Solidworks VBA Macro - First/Next View In Current Sheet
item.description:
Objective

In this article, we understand “how to” First/Next View In Current Sheet in Drawing document from VBA macro.

This is most updated method of First/Next View In Current Sheet in an drawing document.
